Less

Home FAQ Download Bugs and Enhancement Requests Mailing List and Atom Feed

Welcome to the less home page!

Less is a free, open-source file pager. It can be found on most versions of Linux, Unix and Mac OS, as well as on many other operating systems.

Releases

The current released version is less-685. It was released for general use on 14 Oct 2025.

The current beta version is less-690. It was released for beta testing on 2 Jan 2026.

  • Information about less-685
  • Information about less-690
  • Information about older versions

News

2 Jan 2026 less-690 has been released for beta testing.
You can download it here.
The release notes are here.
14 Oct 2025 less-685 has been released for general use.
You can download it here.
The release notes are here.
5 Oct 2025 less-685 has been released for beta testing.
You can download it here.
The release notes are here.
These are the changes in this release:
  • With --incsearch, make a failed search return to the original column as well as the original line.
  • Fix some problems reported by valgrind (github #659, github #660, github #661).
18 Sep 2025 less-684 has been released for beta testing.
You can download it here.
The release notes are here.
These are the changes in this release:
  • Allow mixing of option arguments and filename arguments on the command line unless POSIXLY_CORRECT is set (github #653).
  • Add LESS_TERMCAP_SUSPEND and LESS_TERMCAP_RESUME (github #654).
  • Fix some problems building for z/OS (github #656).

17 Apr 2025 Atom feed is now available for announcements of releases.
I am testing a new Atom feed which will be used to announce releases of less. The feed address is https://greenwoodsoftware.com/less/feed. For now, releases will be announced both in the old mailing list and in the Atom feed. If you have any comments on the Atom feed, you may send email to markn@greenwoodsoftware.com or open an issue at https://github.com/gwsw/less/issues.

This fixes two nasty problems found in less-549:
  • Win32 builds did not work.
  • Sometimes the terminal was left in mouse-reporting mode after exiting less.
14 Feb 2019 less-549 has been released for BETA testing.
You can download it here.
The release notes are here.
This fixes a few problems found in less-548:
  • Support extended X11 mouse reporting, to work in windows wider than 224 columns.
  • Disable mouse reporting while entering multi-character commands.
  • Avoid sending duplicate mouse init sequences.
  • Update Unicode tables.
  • Fix bug in setting single-quote mark.
  • Fix some Win32 bugs.
8 Feb 2019 less-548 has been released for BETA testing.
You can download it here.
The release notes are here.
16 Feb 2018 less-530 has been released for general use.
You can download it here.
The release notes are here.
14 Nov 2017 less-529 has been released for BETA testing.
You can download it here.
The release notes are here.
This version displays Unicode formatting characters (including BOM) in hex if the -U flag is set.
2 Nov 2017 less-527 has been released for BETA testing.
You can download it here.
The release notes are here.
This version changes the new M command to take a mark letter, making it similar to the m command, except the M command marks the bottom line on the screen rather than top line. This version also adds a command ESC-m to remove a mark, fixes a bug that caused an erroneous binary file warning when viewing a UTF-8 file containing SGR sequences, and now correctly handles the keypad Enter key.

You can download it here.

The release notes are here.
This version fixes a regression which caused commands defined in a lesskey file to be immediately executed, even if the "extra" string did not complete the command. It also fixes a bug with GNU regex and removes some compiler warnings.

9 Dec 2012 less-457 is available for BETA testing.
You can download it here.
The release notes are here.
This version completely reverts option string parsing, to avoid incompatibilities with previous versions of less. The new option string syntax is available if and only if the new --use-backslash option appears first.

The release notes are here.
This version changes option string parsing to avoid unnecessary incompatibility with previous versions of less.

This version fixes bugs in less-451, and fixes minor bugs found in less-453 and less-454.

If you find any problems, please report them to bug-less@gnu.org.
9 Jun 2011 less-444 has been released for general use.
This release fixes two bugs found in less-443.
10 Apr 2011 less-443 has been released for general use.
28 Feb 2011 less-441 is available for BETA testing.

less-441 changes the search behavior so that the new -A option introduced in less-440 is now the default. The -A option now changes the behavior to the old, pre-440, behavior.

5 Jan 2011 less-440 is available for BETA testing.

less-440 fixes a bug in less-438 and, at the risk of some feature creep, adds one much requested feature. The -A option changes search behavior so that an initial search includes the entire displayed screen and does not skip the first line as is currently done. Non-initial searches (for example, the "n" command) continue to skip the first (target) line to allow searches to proceed past the current screen.

31 Dec 2010 less-438 is available for BETA testing.
25 Jul 2009 less-436 has been released for general use.
